original_text: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite:
korean_text: 라마 사람 시므이는 포도원을 맡았고 스밤 사람 삽디는 포도원의 소산 포도주 곳간을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포도원 위는 라마 사람 시므이였으며:

sentences.original_text: over the increase of the vineyards
